txt_en: Your silent march through storms writes peace upon our land.
txt_cn: 你穿越风暴的无声行进，在大地写下和平。

txt_en: You had me at hello; it was love at first sight. — Friends
txt_cn: 你一开口我就沦陷了；那是爱情的初见。—《老友记》

txt_en: The truth is out there, and it's waiting. — The X-Files
txt_cn: 真相在外面，它在等待。 —《X档案》

txt_en: A lazy youth, a lousy age.
txt_cn: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲。
